State.Author: Daniel Pistelli
State.Description: Small .exe with sole purpose of applying >2gb patch to .exe and .dll files. Automatically makes backups of original files. Applying this to all .exe and .dll related to Oblivion MAY give some of those with 4gb plus ram a performance boost. Even then extra tweaks and additional utilities are usually necessary to optimize things.
State.Name: 4gb Ram Patcher

State.Author: XMarksTheSpot-Brumbek-Ismelda
State.Description: A replacement of Texian's Window Lighting System now with animated meshes with a tool to animate your own building windows. It also comes now with Chimney Smoke.
State.Name: Animated Window Lighting System and Chimneys - AWLS

State.Author: PushTheWinButton
State.Description: Attempting to harvest an ingredient will automatically harvest all plants of the same type in a small radius at once. Saves you repeatedly pressing on each plant in a patch.
State.Name: Area Harvest - Gather Nearby Plant Clusters

State.Author: PushTheWinButton
State.Description: An immersive overhaul true to the feel of the original game. Rare loot is actually rare, high level enemies only spawn at boss-level spawn points, low level enemies and items can spawn regardless of level, and a tonne of other balance tweaks for almost every aspect of the game. Oblivion, as it was meant to be!
State.Name: Ascension - Immersive Vanilla 'Overhaul'

State.Author: PushTheWinButton
State.Description: An immersive overhaul true to the feel of the original game. Rare loot is actually rare, high level enemies only spawn at boss-level spawn points, low level enemies and items can spawn regardless of level, and a tonne of other balance tweaks for almost every aspect of the game. Oblivion, as it was meant to be!
State.Name: Ascension - Immersive Vanilla 'Overhaul'

State.Author: nuska
State.Description: Replacers for vanilla female armor. Fully covering sets reworked from male versions to fit a female figure. Works with any body replacer.
State.Name: Assorted Protective Female Armors

State.Author: nuska
State.Description: Replacers for vanilla female armor. Fully covering sets reworked from male versions to fit a female figure. Works with any body replacer.
State.Name: Assorted Protective Female Armors

State.Description: Replacers for vanilla female armor. Fully covering sets reworked from male versions to fit a female figure. Works with any body replacer.

State.Description: Replacers for vanilla female armor. Fully covering sets reworked from male versions to fit a female figure. Works with any body replacer.

State.Author: nuska and dasbadman
State.Description: Corrected inventory icons and ground models for armor changed by nuska's Assorted Protective Female Armors.
State.Name: Assorted Protective Female Armors - Refined

State.Author: Jake Alaimo
State.Description: Unused attribute points carry over to your next level. My take on disincentivizing min-maxing approaches to gameplay while also preserving the balance and intent of Oblivion's design as elegantly as possible.
State.Name: Attribute Progression Redesign

State.Author: PushTheWinButton
State.Description: Fixes Oblivion's creature level scaling by making all creature levels static or enforcing a maximum level for scaling with the player. Also balances and fixes creature stats logically across similar types, without altering the vanilla intention.
State.Name: Balanced Creature Stats - Fixed Level Scaling

State.Author: PushTheWinButton
State.Description: Fixes Oblivion's creature level scaling by making all creature levels static or enforcing a maximum level for scaling with the player. Also balances and fixes creature stats logically across similar types, without altering the vanilla intention.
State.Name: Balanced Creature Stats - Fixed Level Scaling

Original.Name: Balanced NPC Level Cap - DLC Patches-50094-2-00-1592501328.zip

State.Author: PushTheWinButton
State.Description: The comprehensive solution to Oblivion's NPC scaling problem: adds consistent level caps to 1,400+ NPCs from the base game and all DLCs.
State.Name: Balanced NPC Level Cap - Logical Levels for All NPCs

State.Author: PushTheWinButton
State.Description: The comprehensive solution to Oblivion's NPC scaling problem: adds consistent level caps to 1,400+ NPCs from the base game and all DLCs.
State.Name: Balanced NPC Level Cap - Logical Levels for All NPCs

State.Author: PushTheWinButton
State.Description: Removes level scaling from all leveled quest rewards and items, instead giving them balanced stats more like how artefacts are handled in Skyrim.
State.Name: Balanced Unleveled Rewards

State.Author: Morbus
State.Description:
::::: Description :::::
After the opportune request of Xanias I decided to tweak this specific feature of Oblivion: the sound of bells. Xanias argued that the bell sounds featured in vanilla Oblivion were very unrealistic, and I completely agree. So now, with Better Bell Sounds, you can finally give the bells the place they deserve in cities. You
State.Name: Better Bell Sounds

State.Author: shadeMe
State.Description: An OBSE plugin that adds support for gender variant head models and textures for NPCs. And allows free camera movement in the race/sex menu. And enables pain-free inventory idle overriding. And per-NPC/Race/scripted body/head texture/model overriding. And animation overriding. And equipment model overriding.
State.Name: Blockhead

State.Author: PushTheWinButton
State.Description: Adds ownership to all random clutter and containers in cities and settlements across Cyrodiil and the Shivering Isles.
State.Name: Complete Clutter and Container Ownership

State.Author: Enodoc
State.Description: Decorative gates alongside the main roads mark the boundaries of the Counties of Cyrodiil.
State.Name: County Gates

State.Author: PushTheWinButton
State.Description: A fix for an engine bug which affects all chance-based creature spawns.
State.Name: Creature Spawn Chance Fix

State.Author: PushTheWinButton
State.Description: A fix for an engine bug which affects all chance-based creature spawns.
State.Name: Creature Spawn Chance Fix

State.Author: frosty-theaussie
State.Description: An update/remake of Saint_Jiub's Diverse Chapels without the 'All Natural' requirement. Re-positions altars and stained glass windows in the Grand Chapels to make it clearer who the city's Patron Divine is.
State.Name: Diverse Chapels Vanilla

State.Author: Mixxa77
State.Description: Places map markers at all Doom and Rune Stones across Cyrodiil. They are not marked on your map, you will have to find them on your own, but after discovering one, you can now Fast-Travel to them. | Based on a_saffin's "Doomstone Map Markers" mod.
State.Name: Doomstone and Runestone Map Markers

State.Author: PushTheWinButton
State.Description: Adds randomised themed spawns to dungeons. Make sure to watch your six!
State.Name: Dungeon Surprise Attacks -  Extra Spawns

State.Author: Tiawar
State.Description: An OBSE plugin containing bug fixes for the Oblivion game engine.
State.Name: EngineBugFixes

State.Author: LprMan
State.Description: An alternative to Natural Vegetation by Max Tael. This mod offers better textures for distant trees/shrubs and the plugins scale vegetation bigger. The textures come in 3 different variations (high/normal/low resolutions) and the plugins offer multiple scaling choices. You can use any plugin + texturepack combination.
State.Name: Enhanced Vegetation

State.Author: XiNAVRO
State.Description: This is a slight modification of LprMan\'s Enhanced Water v2.0 HD, combined with halo112358\'s Shivering Isles addon. It increases the underwater visibility.
State.Name: Enhanced Water v20 HDMI

Original.Name: EVE_HGEC_BodyStock and Clothing Wrye Bash BAIN -24078.7z

State.Author: EVE TEAM see Credits Section
State.Description: Replaces the vanilla/Mods Oblivion clothing and armor to match several versions of the HGEC female body.
State.Name: EVE HGEC Eyecandy Variants Expansion

State.Author: PrinceShroob
State.Description: Adds generic, respawning Fighters Guild, Thieves Guild, and Blades followers.
State.Name: Faction Followers

State.Author: qwerty
State.Description: Allows dismounting your horse almost twice as fast.
State.Name: Faster Horse Dismount

State.Author: Ferretmyster
State.Description: All Runestones and Doomstones and Ayleid Wells glow and also produce unique sound.
State.Name: Glowing Stones

State.Author: Ger1
State.Description:
This is just a simple recolor of the existing Elven armour to make it more gold rather than yellow/green.  It is a replacement, NOT new armour and just has texture files and requires no ESP.

Just extract to your Oblivion folder.  The Readme has more instructions, especially if the new textures do not load on their own.
State.Name: Golden Elven Armour

State.Author: Ger1
State.Description:
This is a simple color tweak of the Elven weapons to go along with the Armour recolor.  It makes the weapons more golden, rather than yellow/green.
Extract file to the Oblivion folder and check the readme for more info.  This is a texture REPLACER, so there is no ESP.
State.Name: Golden Elven Weapons

State.Author: lazygecko
State.Description: Bethesda hates him! Overhaul your Oblivion sound with this one weird trick.
State.Name: GOSH - Gecko's Oblivion Sound overHaul

State.Author: Ironman5000
State.Description: 100 secret Ayleid chests scattered across Tamriel and Shivering Isles, containing expensive and rare levelled loot.
State.Name: Hidden Treasures of Tamriel

State.Author: PushTheWinButton
State.Description: Makes outlaws look more villainous by adding a chance for Bandits, Highwaymen, Marauders, and Vampires to be wearing various hoods. Optionally covers Conjurers and Necromancers.
State.Name: Hooded Outlaws

State.Author: qwerty
State.Description: Connects small ponds in Imperial City into a full circular canal.
State.Name: Imperial City Canal Overhaul

State.Description: Removes the infamy reset from completing the pilgrimage added by Knights of the Nine, whilst exactly preserving all other infamy-related features of the DLC and base game.

State.Description: Removes the infamy reset from completing the pilgrimage added by Knights of the Nine, whilst exactly preserving all other infamy-related features of the DLC and base game.

State.Description: A beginner-friendly modding guide that brings the spirit of vanilla plus all the way to the lands of Cyrodiil!

State.Author: acidrain226
State.Description:
Light Spell Recolor by acidrain226
=========
DESCRIPTION
=========
I\'ve always hated the default bright green color of the light spell so I created this mod. Now you have a choice of Torch, White, Blue, Lite Blue or Red. Color suggestions are welcome.

==========
INSTRUCTIONS
==========
Simply extract to your Oblivion/Data folder and ac
State.Name: Light Spell Recolor

State.Author: monkeyangie
State.Description: Adds exterior light posts to all the main roads of Cyrodiil, and lanterns to settlements and inns. You can choose between 6 different light posts.
State.Name: Lights of Oblivion - Road Lanterns

State.Author: me
State.Description: Replaces and retextures Mankar Camorans robes to be coloured in such a way befitting of the leader of the Mythic Dawn instead of his clothing just having the base Arch Mage texture.
State.Name: Mankar Camoran - Mythic Styled Robe Replacer

State.Author: PushTheWinButton
State.Description: Fixes Mercantile experience gains in the simplest available method. Nothing more, nothing less. Just vanilla—fixed.
State.Name: Mercantile Experience Fix - Simplified

State.Description: A beginner-friendly modding guide that brings the spirit of vanilla plus all the way to the lands of Cyrodiil!

State.Description: Cleanest, lightweight and consistent weather overhaul for Oblivion.

Original.Name: No Backwards Running - Simplified and Improved-50109-1-1-0-1643581164.7z

State.Author: PushTheWinButton
State.Description: Disables the ability to run backwards by forcing you to walk instead. Stand and fight or flee—none of this kiting backwards malarkey. Simplest implementation of this concept available on the Nexus.
State.Name: No Backwards Running - Simplified and Improved

State.Author: Laulajatar
State.Description: Removes the crosshair from Rythe Lythandas' painting. Bethesda, plz.
State.Name: No more crosshair on Rythe's painting

State.Author: PushTheWinButton
State.Description: A plugin replacer for Oblivion Character Overhaul that removes all dirty edits and ITM records. Optionally restores vanilla hairs.
State.Name: Oblivion Character Overhaul Cleaned - OCO Cleaned

Original.Name: Oblivion Character Overhaul Cleaned - Vanilla Hair-51324-1-0-0-1629621931.7z

State.Description: Fix for Oblivion Character Overhaul v2.
State.Name: Oblivion Character Overhaul V2 - DLC Faces

State.Author: nuska
State.Description: A comprehensive, all-in-one revamp of Oblivion character heads. New head shapes, skin textures, normal maps, eye textures and some new hairstyles covering all races in the game, including Dremoras and Shivering Isles races, all built to a single unified art direction that adheres to the styles of Skyrim and TESO. Affects both player and NPCs.
State.Name: Oblivion Character Overhaul version 2

State.Author: PushTheWinButton
State.Description: Restores the cut vanilla potion colour variations using a single lightweight script to avoid conflicts.
State.Name: Potion Bottle Variation Restoration

State.Author: PushTheWinButton
State.Description: Makes unused training sessions rollover into the next level, and training costs are now dependent on the trainer's disposition and skill.
State.Name: Practical Training

State.Author: Dispensation
State.Description: Makes slow walking quest NPCs run.
State.Name: Quest NPCs Run

State.Author: Brumbek
State.Description: Another grass tiling mod! This one combines the best of them all. Look at the pics to see if you like it. It\'s great! ;)
State.Name: Really Better Tiling Grass

State.Author: Sneakstep
State.Description:
Hi,

I made a couple of [i]silent tracks[/i] of different length and put them into the explore, public and dungeon folder.

. 15\' - 1x
. 30\' - 2x
. 45\' - 2x
. 60\' - 2x
. 90\' - 1x

The effect is great! I didn\'t like it when one track played after another without any pause. Now there is a random chance of getting a silent
State.Name: Silent Tracks Expanded

State.Author: PushTheWinButton
State.Description: Adds simple, vanilla-friendly saddlebags to all vanilla and DLC horses and follow/wait commands.
State.Name: Simple Horse Utilities - Saddlebags and Follow-Wait Commands

State.Author: PushTheWinButton
State.Description: A lightweight mod that automatically creates saves at customisable intervals and when you level up. Replaces the buggy vanilla autosave system.
State.Name: Simple Saves Plus

State.Author: Tycho
State.Description:
This is a revival of my previous mod, Tycho\'s Shield On Back 2.0. That
version, while it functioned, was quite buggy and didnt work for alot of
shields. 

This version however, will! Due to some updates to OBSE (Oblivion Script
Extender) the mod has had some new life breathed into it:
State.Name: Tychos Shield On Back Revived

State.Author: PushTheWinButton
State.Description: A highly optimised alternative to the original Shield on Back plugins, completely rebuilt with heavily reduced scripting. Shields will be displaced from the players arm to the back whenever weapons are sheathed.
State.Name: Simple Shield on Back

State.Author: PushTheWinButton
State.Description: A diary that tracks useful information about your class, skills, and attribute bonuses. Lightweight - no permanently-running scripts.
State.Name: Skill Diary Redone

State.Author: PushTheWinButton
State.Description: Adds static alchemy apparatus and automatic shared ingredient storage to several locations across Cyrodiil and the Shivering Isles. Lightweight and designed to fit in with the vanilla game seamlessly.
State.Name: Static Alchemy and Ingredient Storage

State.Author: PushTheWinButton
State.Description: This mod adds two teleportation networks to Cyrodiil that act as simple and vanilla-friendly fast travel alternatives.
State.Name: Teleportation Services - Simple Fast Travel Alternatives

State.Author: Migck
State.Description: Makes you have to buy the upgrades for Dunbarrow Cove with your Mercantile skill, like every other DLC, instead of buying them from dialog topics with a fixed price.
State.Name: Thieves Den Barter for Upgrades

State.Author: PushTheWinButton
State.Description: A beginner-friendly modding guide that brings the spirit of vanilla plus all the way to the lands of Cyrodiil!
State.Name: Through the Valleys - PushTheWinButton's Vanilla Plus Modding Guide

State.Description: High-Resolution cloaks for all, now with new meshes!

State.Author: Quarn and Kivan and Arthmoor and PrinceShroob
State.Description: The aim of this mod is to fix the bugs existing in the official mods released by Bethesda.
State.Name: Unofficial Oblivion DLC Patches

State.Description: An Oblivion mod that fixes over 2,500 bugs (and 70,000 object placement errors.)

State.Description: This mod is a joint effort to fix the vast amount of bugs currently existing in the Shivering Isles expansion pack for Oblivion v1.2.0416.

State.Description: Places map markers at all Wayshrines across Cyrodiil. They are not marked on your map, you will have to find them on your own, but after discovering one, you can now Fast-Travel to them. | Based on Mezlo's "Wayshrine Map Markers" mod.
State.Name: Wayshrine Map Markers - Redux

State.Description: Renames all Iron and Steel bows to more logical wooden names. Affects all Iron and Steel bows, including those added by Shivering Isles.

State.Description: This mod takes the Far Cry inspired grass by betty and expands it to other areas of Cyrodiil and even the Shivering Isles and the Paradise.

State.Description: Attempts to fix some issues the original Really Textured Normal Maps for Vanilla mod had.

Makes items and spells a bit smaller in inventory.

Also makes inventory and map windows larger.
